description: Mix things up at Easter brunch with hot cross bun bruschetta. The blend of sweet spices, salty prosciutto and crisp fresh apple is a true flavour sensation.
name: Apple & Prosciutto Hot Cross Bun Bruschetta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 Kanzi apple, halved, cored, thinly sliced
3 Woolworths fruitless hot cross buns, split, toasted
1 sprig mint, leaves picked, roughly torn

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange prosciutto and apple on cut-sides of buns. Serve topped with mint.
